title: FOCCTS 150 Pcs Cedar Blocks, Natural Aromatic Cedar Wood for Clothes Storages, Aromatic Cedar Balls
features: 【Natural Cedar Blocks】- Cedar balls are made of natural red cedar wood without adding any chemicals. Natural and safe materials can be touched by kids.
【Smooth Surface Design】- Natural cedar wooden balls with excellent hand-polishing, smooth finish without burr, it can directly touches sweaters and that wont snag delicate fabrics.

【Household Good Help】- Red cedar wood balls are the perfect gift of nature. Keeping your clothes and stuff fresh, as well as absorbing moisture and odours, refresh your closet and protect laxury clothes.

【Long Lasting Aroma】- The natural aromatic red cedar can be used in any household storage system. The original scent of cedar wood is light and lasting, it can be refreshed by manually sanding the surface of the blocks lightly with sand papers to expose fresh fibers.
【Wide Application】 - 150 packs natural red cedar blocks ideal for closets, drawers, shoe cabinets, shelves, boxes or the bottom of wardrobes, cars, kitchen, bathroom or anywhere in your home.
description: FOCCTS Natural Aromatic Red Cedar Wooden Balls Cedar balls cloth storage are made of 100% natural aromatic cedar wood.
